description: Returns a list of all Amazon EMR Studios associated with the Amazon Web Services account. The list includes details such as ID, Studio Access URL, and creation time for each Studio.

nested_items.name: Studios
nested_items.description: The list of Studio summary objects.

nested_items.name: StudioId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) associated with the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The detailed description of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The unique access URL of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: AuthMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Studio authenticates users using IAM or IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Amazon EMR Studio was created.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
